name: eslint-plugin-levitate
description: A set of useful ESLint rules

scripts.docs: node generateREADME.js && (git status --short | grep README.md && git add README.md && git commit -m "Update README.md") || echo "No updates on README.md"
scripts.preversion: npm install && npm run test && npm run docs && git push --dry-run origin master

author: Anantachai Saothong <thisismanta@gmail.com>
